title: Why Holistic Medicine Is Better For Long-Term Health Wellness
author: Phoenix Rising Wellness Center
description: Many of us have heard the term "holistic medicine," but what is it exactly? According to WebMD, "Holistic medicine is a form of healing that considers the whole person -body, mind, spirit and emotions - in the quest for ...
cleaned_text: can find more details about common issues that affect our everyday life. We accept health insurances, auto-injury patients, and Workman's Comp. This website uses cookies. By continuing to use this site, you accept our use of cookies.
